page.title: 01Daviot village Aberdeenshire
page.content: 7 minor roads lead from A920 & B9001 to Daviot,social hub of this rolling farmland area with more crops than pasture.Housing in the village is 50/50 private/council.The public hall (committee run)hosts WRI, Womens' Guild,Playgroup,Bowling Group,Badmin- ton,Youth Club,whists,dances, social evenings & dancing classes. Nearby a wood owned by the boy scouts (in which there is a stone circle)provides a facility for camping & outdoor activities.Also nearby, in its wooded environs,House of Daviot(a mental hospital with private & NHS patients) forms its own community with shop,chapel etc.This provides work for some of the inhabitants of the village and environs.Apart from farming work is in;trades,oil industry professions,private enterprises, with a few retired people.
